Detailed Description

Corresponds to a Programming Interface entry in 'pci.ids'.

Contains the Prog-if Code and Name.

See also:
pci_ids.cc

Definition at line 250 of file pci_class_ids.hpp.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

PciIdsProgif::PciIdsProgif ( PciIdsSubclass *  pParent,
std::string  pCode,
std::string  pName 
) [inline]

Constructor.

Create a Pci IDs Prog-if instance with provided code and name. And add itself to the list of Prog-ifs of provided Subclass.

Parameters:
pParent Pointer to Subclass of the Prog-if.
pCode Prog-if Code.
pName Prog-if Name.
